  • Constructor Details

    • SceneManager

      public SceneManager()

  • Method Details

    • setStage

      public static void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Sets up and displays the main stage of the application

      This method loads the HomeScene FXML file, initializes the main scene, applies global cursor and button animations, and sets the scene to full screen.

      Parameters:
      stage - the primary Stage where the scene will be set

    • switchTo

      public static void switchTo(String sceneName) throws IOException
      Switches the current scene to the one specified by sceneName.

      This method loads the corresponding FXML file located at /scenes/[sceneName]View/[sceneName].fxml, applies global cursor settings and animations to all buttons, and updates the root of the main scene.

      Parameters:
      sceneName - the name of the scene to switch to (must match the FXML folder and file name)
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML file cannot be found or loaded

    • closeStage

      public static void closeStage()
      Closes the primary application stage.

    • showColorSelectionWindow

      public static Card.Color showColorSelectionWindow()
      Displays a modal dialog allowing the user to select a card color.

      Presents a transparent stage with color options, waits for user input, and returns the selected color or a default if none is chosen.

      Returns:
      the selected Card.Color

    • showTurnText

      public static void showTurnText(String message)
      Displays or updates an overlay at the top of the main scene to indicate the current player's turn.

      If the overlay does not exist, it is created with styled text and added to the root pane. Otherwise, the existing text is updated.

      Parameters:
      message - the text to display in the turn overlay
